title: Safety, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics of nirmatrelvir and ritonavir in patients with severe COVID-19 and renal impairment: A case report
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Ren Zheng, Xudong Fan, Feng Zhou, Xiqian Ye, Jing Sun, Junjie Cheng, Yuan Yuan, Yu Wang, Xinjun Cai, Anqi Wei
